headline: Albemarle CEO says 'math doesn't work' for US lithium refinery project
summary: Albemarle's stalled plans tobuild the largest U.S. lithium refinery remain on hold due tothe ongoing global glut of the battery metal that has draggeddown market prices, the company's CEO told...

headline: Albemarle's Q1 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Miss on Lower Prices
summary: Lower prices in the Energy Storage segment hurt ALB's top line in the first quarter, offsetting higher volumes in Specialties.
